user_query: I need access to all the guidelines related to vaccinations, the carbon equivalent of consuming 10 liters of diesel fuel, and the current air quality health index in my city.

TaskList.description: Fetch a comprehensive list of vaccination guidelines from a reliable medical database or organization.
Calculate the carbon equivalent of consuming 10 liters of diesel fuel based on predefined emission factors.
Retrieve the current air quality health index for the user's city from a trusted environmental data source.
